quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold WebMD, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers, harmless from and against any claims, actions or demands, liabilities and settlements including without limitation, reasonable legal and accounting fees, resulting from, or alleged to result from: (a) your use of the Site, (b) any User Content you post or upload, (c) your use of or reliance on any User Content
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
